title: This speedy wireless iPhone charger is now just $40 during Presidents’ Day
content:
Macworld

If you’re tired of carrying a cable around to keep your iPhone juiced on the go, look no further than this wireless, quick-charging gadget. The Speedy Mag Wireless Charger is designed for iPhone 12 and later and makes it incredibly simple to recharge your device anywhere for only $39.99 (reg. $119) during the Presidents’ Day sale!

Specifically optimized for Apple devices, the Fast Mag Wireless feature delivers power to your iPhone at the ideal ultra-fast speed. You can revitalize your iPhone from 0% to 100% battery life in just 30 minutes, and thanks to the Speedy Mag’s built-in magnet and metal plate, you can enjoy an ultra-secure wireless charging experience.

Beyond its speed, this unit is slick and stylish, equipped with features that safeguard your device from overcharging or overheating. It’s also compatible with other Qi-enabled devices, offering versatility for all your charging needs. No wonder one verified buyer wrote, “Love that I no longer have to worry about being out and about and my phone battery dying. I pop on this charger, and it keeps my phone charged.”

Never worry about touting around a clunky charging cable again.

Enjoy Presidents’ Day savings on the Speedy Mag Wireless Charger for iPhone 12 and newer, now just $39.99 for a limited time.

 

Speedy Mag Wireless Charger for iPhone

Only $39.99 through Macworld

StackSocial prices subject to change.
